00049 Client::Client(const String &install_dir, const String &config_file) {
00050   System::initialize(install_dir);
00051   ReactorFactory::initialize((uint16_t)System::get_processor_count());
00052   initialize(config_file);

00055 Client::Client(const String &install_dir) {
00056   System::initialize(install_dir);
00057   ReactorFactory::initialize((uint16_t)System::get_processor_count());
00058   initialize(System::install_dir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg");

00064 void Client::create_table(const String &name, const String &schema) {
00065   int error;
00066   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->create_table(name.c_str(), schema.c_str())) != Error::OK)
00067     HT_THROW(error, "");
00068 }

00082 uint32_t Client::get_table_id(const String &name) {
00083   int error;
00084   // TODO: issue 11
00085   String table_file = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + name;
00086   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00087   Hyperspace::HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00088   uint64_t handle;
00089   uint32_t uval;
00090 
00094   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(table_file.c_str(), OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback, &handle)) != Error::OK)
00095     HT_THROW(error, (String)"Hyperspace::open(" + table_file + ") failed");
00096 
00100   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf)) != Error::OK)
00101     HT_THROW(error, (String)"Hyperspace::attr_get(file='" + table_file + "', attr=table_id) failed");
00102 
00106   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle)) != Error::OK)
00107     HT_THROW(error, "");
00108 
00109   assert(value_buf.fill() == sizeof(int32_t));
00110 
00111   memcpy(&uval, value_buf.base, sizeof(int32_t));
00112 
00113   return uval;
00114 }

00120 String Client::get_schema(const String &name) {
00121   int error;
00122   String schema;
00123   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->get_schema(name.c_str(), schema)) != Error::OK)
00124     HT_THROW(error, "");
00125   return schema;

00132 void Client::get_tables(std::vector<String> &tables) {
00133   int error;
00134   uint64_t handle;
00135   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00136   std::vector<Hyperspace::DirEntry> listing;
00137 
00138   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/tables", OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback, &handle)) != Error::OK)
00139     HT_THROW(error, "");
00140 
00141   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->readdir(handle, listing)) != Error::OK)
00142     HT_THROW(error, "");
00143 
00144   for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00145     if (!listing[i].is_dir)
00146       tables.push_back(listing[i].name);
00147   }
00148 
00149   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00150 
00151 }

00154 void Client::drop_table(const String &name, bool if_exists) {
00155   int error;
00156   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->drop_table(name.c_str(), if_exists)) != Error::OK)
00157     HT_THROW(error, "");
00158 }

00160 void Client::shutdown() {
00161   int error;
00162   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->shutdown()) != Error::OK)
00163     HT_THROW(error, "");
00164 }

00177 void Client::initialize(const String &config_file) {
00178   time_t master_timeout;
00179 
00180   m_props_ptr = new Properties(config_file);
00181 
00182   m_comm = Comm::instance();
00183   m_conn_manager_ptr = new ConnectionManager(m_comm);
00184 
00185   m_hyperspace_ptr = new Hyperspace::Session(m_comm, m_props_ptr);
00186   while (!m_hyperspace_ptr->wait_for_connection(2)) {
00187     cout << "Waiting for connection to Hyperspace..." << flush;
00188     poll(0, 0, 5000);
00189     cout << endl << flush;
00190   }
00191 
00192   m_app_queue_ptr = new ApplicationQueue(1);
00193 
00194   master_timeout = m_props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Master.Client.Timeout", 180);
00195 
00196   m_master_client_ptr = new MasterClient(m_conn_manager_ptr, m_hyperspace_ptr, master_timeout, m_app_queue_ptr);
00197   if (m_master_client_ptr->initiate_connection(0) != Error::OK) {
00198     HT_ERROR("Unable to establish connection with Master, exiting...");
00199     exit(1);
00200   }
00201 }
